1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Proskuriny try to find a culprit in encroaching upon Larisa. Kira and Ignat are sure: the events of rock night are somehow related to the name of Vadim. Emelyanov hears about the criminal past of young man. Pyzh and Shulga appear in a settlement.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: A new investigator Peter Larichev arrives in a settlement. Investigation into the Dasha case drives him to the house of Proskuriny. Ann by chance gets in the past. In a hospital Larisa remembers, who attacked her. Pyzh and Shulga watch at back of house of Proskuriny.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Igor hears about the return of Nika. On Larisa a new attempt is accomplished. Ignat appears in the past and meets with the killer of Alisa and Anton. Larichev hears about the new circumstances of murder of Dasha.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Larisa returns home. Ignat asks Kira to move to him. Asya hears about the recommencing novel of Igor and Nika. Robert accomplishes a theft in the house of Didovy.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Renata understands that Emelyanov got into trouble. Larichev and Ignat study the instrument of murder of Dasha. Behavior of Alexander frightens Asya. Ella reports to Dmitry, that waits a child from him. Nikita asks Dmitry to reconcile with Ella.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Larichev hears about the ghosts of house of Proskuriny. Dmitry and Larisa decide to sell a house. Alisa and Anton against it. Nika finds a method to release family of Proskuriny from ghosts.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Asya gives the telephone of disappearing Robert to Alexander. Ignat asks Dmitry and Larisa not to sell a house. Kira and Ignat quarrel. Larisa hears about pregnancy of Ella. Dmitry reports to Ella, that will not go back to her. Anya disappears under strange circumstances.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Ella blackmails Dmitry. Shulga requires, that Ignat contacted with Vadim. Nikita offers to Larisa to go away from Dmitry. Nika participates in a mortally dangerous experiment.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Ignat tries to reconcile with Kira. Alexander hires a detective, to find Robert. Igor is afraid of contact of Nika with ghosts. Dmitry hears about the novel of Larisa and Nikita.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Dmitry accuses Larisa of treason. Larichev asks Ignat " to contact" with Vadim. Kira keeps out Ignat in a house. Anya decides forever to go away to Anton in the past. Larichev hears about the mortal diagnosis of Renata. Nika can not return from the world of ghosts.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Alisa infused with in the body of Nika. Creditors threaten Alexander. Asya hears about the pregnancy. Dmitry intends to divorce with Larisa. Larichev offers to Renata to give up investigation. Shulga and Pyzh attack Ignat. Kira is stolen by a man in the mask of death.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: The parents of Dasha persuade Asya to conduct another spiritualistic session. Larichev gets a deathbed message from Renata. As a result of unsuccessful experiment Leva dies.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Pyzh tries to gun Ignat down, however the ghost of Renata gets up on his way. Martov announces care on a pension. Walking up to the well, Larisa sees the stage of murder of Anton. Asya inveigles Igor deception into the neglected house. Together with Vlad, they try to go out on a contact with Alisa.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Alisa infused with in the body of Asya . Looking on strange behavior of Asya, all decide that she is drunk. Nika explains to Igor, why freed ghosts and why Alisa chose Asya. Dasha find in basement of one of houses.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Asya contests with Alisa in itself. Alexander is disturbed by behavior of daughter. Inga is worried by blowing off yesterday's oblation. Alexander and Inga decide that they need to leave. Renata comes to Ignat. She tells history of theft of amulet and murder of Alisa and Anton.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Anya appears sharpened in the past. The secret of ghosts is opened Ignat. Dmitry and Larisa accept a final decision concerning a house. After many years Alisa meets with Vadim.

imdb.plot outline: After an attack unknown on Larisa the frightful and enigmatic phenomena continue in a house to take place. A mortal danger threatens all family of Proskuriny members, ghosts will not calm down in fact, while will not be punished guilty in their death.
imdb.title: Zdes kto-to est: Iskuplenie
plot: After an attack unknown on Larisa the frightful and enigmatic phenomena continue in a house to take place. A mortal danger threatens all family of Proskuriny members, ghosts will not calm down in fact, while will not be punished guilty in their death.
